description: `v-selection-control` components allow a user to select options. These components must be used with the v-model prop as they do not maintain their own state.

props.baseColor: Sets the color of the input when it is not focused.
props.value: The value used when the component is selected in a group. If not provided, a unique ID will be used.

slots.input: The slot used for the default input element.

exposed.isFocused: Will return true if the component is currently focused.
exposed.input: Reference to the root input element.
